name: Tristan and Isolde
overview: An adventure game based on a famous Bavarian Legend. Our hero is Tristan, the honourable Knight. Tristan must save his beloved Isolde from the evil Wumper, bad Baron of Wummerstein. You must control Tristan on his gallant mission within Wumpers's sinister castle. Make sure you possess magic shoes - with these you can fly. Beware the evil Wumper, you must fight him at all costs!!
